entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 1:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
